history.proof: split. - intros H. shelve. - intros [b [pf send_step]]. auto.

exceptions.tactic: intros cn others pts Hnin Puniq ptag prec commit to this d msg.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
ptag: ttag
prec: PStateT -> payload -> Prop
pn_prec_safe: forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
commit: bool
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
msg: data

Goal:
pn_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : union_map_classPCM heapUMC) (pf : pn_safe this to d msg), pn_step pf = Some b)

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
HPn = fun this to : nat_eqType => this \in pts /\ to == cn : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
payload = seq nat : Set
ttag = nat : Set
union_map_classPCM : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> pcm
from : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> nat
Notation seq := list
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (dynamic id)
pn_step : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), pn_safe this to d msg -> option (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
PStateT = (nat * PState)%type : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 commit : bool this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : data |- eqType]
pn_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : data) => HPn this n /\ (exists (Hp : HPn this n) (C : coh d), prec (getStP C (pn_this_in Hp)) msg) : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> data -> Prop
active : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> bool
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
data = seq nid : Set
cohMsg = fun (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%nat_scope
nid = nat : Set
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 commit : bool this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : data |- Type]
content : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> mtype
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 commit : bool this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : data |- UMC.sort ?U]
find_none : find ?k ?f = None -> ?k \notin dom ?f where ?K : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts ptag : ttag prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop pn_prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn this to -> prec s m ->...-> cohMsg {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1 commit : bool this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : data |- UMC.sort ?U]

step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope

```  
intros cn others pts Hnin Puniq ptag prec commit to this d msg.
split.
- intros H. split. assumption. exists. assumption.
- intros [b [pf send_step]]. exists b. exists pf. assumption.
